content: the trinity hat pattern is for a crocheted hat using the trinity stitch worked in the round to give the hat texture and visual interest the hat is worked top down and finished with a post stitch ribbing an optional faux fur pom pom can be added at the end to finish it off the hat pattern comes with instructions for 5 different sizes- adult child toddler 6-12 month baby and 3-6 month baby the hats are made with worsted weight yarn samples made with red heart super saver ombre finished size adult child toddler 6-12 month and 3-6 month supplies worsted weight yarn in desired color 1 crochet hook 5 5 mm yarn needle optional- faux fur pom pom
